name: Mann
resume:
Embark on an expedition to Mann, the frozen planet, where vast glaciers and icy oceans stretch as far as the eye can see.
   Explore the remnants of the Lazarus mission and face the extreme conditions of a hostile yet fascinating world.
presentation:
Discover the planet Mann, an isolated frozen world at the edge of the known universe.
Walk on endless ice plains, dive into crystal-clear ice caves, and explore the abandoned station of Dr. Mann.

Participate in a survival simulation in extreme environments and observe firsthand the effects of reduced gravity on planetary exploration.
Whether you are a scientist, an adventurer, or an astronomy enthusiast, Mann offers a unique immersion into the mysteries of deep space.

Join this exceptional mission and embark on 4 days of exploration through this frozen and desolate world.

schedule.description1:
Landing on the ice cap and setting up the exploration camp.
   Briefing on weather conditions and safety protocols.
schedule.description2:
Explore the remnants of Dr. Mann‚Äôs station.

schedule.description1:
Survival simulation in an extreme glacial climate.
   Learn how to use heated suits and manage oxygen in a hostile environment.
schedule.description2:
Descend into a millennia-old ice rift.
   Study crystalline structures and potential pockets of extraterrestrial life.

schedule.description1:
Expedition across the ice to recover data from Lazarus beacons.
   Analyze frozen tides and the impact of reduced gravity on water surfaces.

Set up a temporary camp inside an ice cave for an overnight stay.
   Observe the breathtaking auroras caused by Mann's unique atmospheric composition.
schedule.description2:
Debriefing on collected data and scientific findings.
   Preparation for departure back to base.
